title: Simple Calculator with Addition, Subtraction & Multiply operations
description: Calculators is a great way to understand UI and event processing in an application. In this problem you will create a calculator that supports basic arithmetic calculations on integers.

title: Weather app
description: A weather application to get the temperature, weather condition and whether it is day or night of a particular city using a free weather api.

title: Passport status tracking system
description: This project provides a clear Passport status tracking for the end users.Project covers the end to end communication of applying passport to Status tracking.

title: Face detection
description: It focuses on building a face detection software using the OpenCV library. The face detection program will be modelled in a way that it can detect faces in live stream videos.

title: Detection of brain tumor with the help of image segmentation
description: The premise of the project is straightforward. You have to create a classifier that should be able to find tumors just from the pictures of the brain that you would provide the model.

title: Decentralized chat app
description: Decentralized applications are apps that run on a decentralized network via peer-to-peer protocols. One of their biggest strengths is that they avoid any single point of failure.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Tic Tac Toe is a good project for beginners, this is a two player game, where each player will get a chance one after the other.

title: Countdown Timer
description: A countdown timer is a virtual clock on a landing page that counts down from a certain number or date to indicate the beginning or end of an event or offer.

title: Calendar App
description: A Simple Calendar that has a chart showing the days, weeks, and months of the year

title: Bus Booking System
description: Bus Booking System is a web based application which is connected to a complete database. The database includes information about buses, no. of seats available, occupancy, availability, days and time of operation, no. of buses  from point ‘A’ to point ‘B’, Price ranges, automated report and bill generation etc.

title: Hospital Management System
description: The project “Hospital Management System” is aimed to develop to maintainthe day-to-day state of admission/discharge of Patients, List of Doctors (Consultants), List of medicines, Bills etc.

title: Online Exam System
description: Exam Software is a Test Management Software, which offers a complete solution for Computer Based Test (CBT) .They are used to set up multiple choice tests for set time periods that when submitted are automatically corrected and the results logged beside the student’s reference number.

title: Online Chat System
description: Online Chat System project will allow its users to chat with their friend circles and send invitation to their other friends to join this chat system.

title: YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
description: Have a ability to download YouTube Thumbnail with the help of YouTube URL. It Should support the playlist too. Tip: YouTube Thumbnail can be created by this url: https://i.ytimg.com/vi/[VIDEO_ID]/maxresdefault.jpg

title: Get My IP
description: Have a ability to get the user's ip and display it in user-friendly way. IP can be accessed by this url: https://ipv4.icanhazip.com/

title: English to Tamil Translater
description: Build a form with necessary fields and after entering input field, it should translate your english word into tamil word. API: https://transservice.ecinet.in/api/Transliteration/GetSuggestions?transliteration=NAME&itext=ANBUSELVAN&locale=tm_in

title: Dictionary web app
description: In this project, you'll integrate with the Dictionary API to create a real-world dictionary web app. Additional tests include colour themes and font selection. https://dictionaryapi.dev/

title: GitHub user search app
description: In this project, you'll use the GitHub users API to pull profile data and display it. It's a great challenge if you're looking to practice working with a 3rd-party API.

title: Tip calculator app
description: This small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!

title: Advice Slip JSON API
description: This is a really simple advice generator app powered with JavaScript and uses advice slip API to get some random Advice and display it to the user.

title: Get Country by IP Address
description: Country is an open-source geolocation API that finds a user's country (and nothing else) from their IP address. It works both with IPv4 and IPv6.

title: REST Countries
description: Get information about countries via a RESTful API

title: Trivia API
description: The Open Trivia Database provides a completely free JSON API for use in programming projects. Use of this API does not require a API Key, just generate the URL below use it in your own application to retrieve trivia questions.

title: Offical Joke API
description: Displays jokes from various categories. Check here for more information.

title: Dark Joke API (Multi)
description: Programming, Miscellaneous and Dark Jokes. Check here for more information. https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/

title: Dominos Store App
description: Display Dominos Stores based on cities. You can practice alot using store data, menu data, deals etc.
